dataSource: WebSearch aggregation (Trendlyne, MoneyControl, Screener, MarketsMojo, Multibagg)

Q1_FY2026.notes: Net sales Rs 1,998.38 cr, consolidated net profit Rs 122.29 cr

Q2_FY2026.notes: Revenue grew 1% YoY. Net profit fell 41% YoY (impacted by Rs 20.36 cr exceptional charge for Vadodara plant restructuring). Adjusted EBITDA Rs 158 cr at 8.3% margin.

FY2025.notes: Net profit margin improved from 6.0% in FY24 to 7.2% in FY25. ROE improved to 17.0% from 15.1%.

keyRatios.notes: ROE improved from 15.1% (FY24) to 17.0% (FY25). ROCE improved from 20.2% (FY24) to 24.3% (FY25). Almost debt free.

balanceSheetHighlights.notes: Almost debt free. D/E of 0.14. Current ratio 1.27. Margin pressure deepening in Q2 FY26.

earningsTranscriptSummary.source: Yahoo Finance (CROMPTON.BO Q2 FY26 earnings call), AlphaSpread Q1 FY26
keyHighlights: Margin pressure deepens in Q2 FY26 with profitability plunging 43%
Strategic shifts and solar ambitions discussed in Q2 call
Vadodara plant restructuring exceptional charge of Rs 20.36 cr
Strong revenue growth but profitability challenges
